item.title: Overview
item.description: This project is currently still under development. item.title: Requirements
item.description: Requirements # Full screen Open in a new page var button = document.getElementById("btn-636e81262af8d0df"); button.onclick = ()={ var elem = document.getElementById("ifm-636e81262af8d0df"); if (elem.requestFullscreen) { elem.requestFullscreen(); } else if (elem.webkitRequestFullscreen) { elem.webkitRequestFullscreen(); } else if (elem.msRequestFullscreen) { elem.msRequestFullscreen(); } };

item.title: Schematics
item.description: schematics commit link Top View # Full Screen function setup_svg_panzoom(){ let params = { panEnabled: true, zoomEnabled: true, dblClickZoomEnabled: true, controlIconsEnabled: false, mouseWheelZoomEnabled: true, preventMouseEventsDefault: true, zoomScaleSensitivity: 0.6, minZoom: 0.5, maxZoom: 4, fit: true , contain: true , center: true , refreshRate: 'auto' }; let svg_pz = svgPanZoom('#svg-ab7eb4abeb0393b5' ,params); window["svg_ab7eb4abeb0393b5"] = svg_pz let button = document.getElementById("btn-ab7eb4abeb0393b5"); button.onclick = ()={ var elem = document.

item.title: Developers Section
item.description: Firmware repo - Developers Developers section # In this section you’ll find all the documentation of the project and also how you can customize the behavior of the board by implementing your custom functionality Specifications # Hardware # #TODO describe the main chips of the board Software # For the development of the code FreeRTOS was used because it offers the ability to divide the code in modules (tasks) and with this when new functionality is added you only need to consider (for the most part) the requirements and timing of the new functionality and FreeRTOS will handle the timing and resources of the other tasks so everything runs as expected.

item.title: Interactive BOM
item.description: Interactive Bill of Materials # schematics commit link Full screen Open in a new page var button = document.getElementById("btn-fcff0563fc99c7ad"); button.onclick = ()={ var elem = document.getElementById("ifm-fcff0563fc99c7ad"); if (elem.requestFullscreen) { elem.requestFullscreen(); } else if (elem.webkitRequestFullscreen) { elem.webkitRequestFullscreen(); } else if (elem.msRequestFullscreen) { elem.msRequestFullscreen(); } };
